messages.body:
Hi there,

I recently purchased your Premium Analytics Dashboard on January 15th ($49.99) and I'm having trouble accessing it. The transaction ID is TXN789456123 but when I try to log in, it says my subscription is inactive. My license key shows as: LIC-7845-9632-1478-PREM but it's not being recognized.

Could you please help me get this sorted out?

Thanks,
Mark

conversation.subject: Premium Dashboard Access Issue - License Not Recognized
